verbs.description: [V: slow] cooker [ARG1: italian beef sandwiches] i have fond memories of my mother in the kitchen preparing her amazing beef dip sandwiches they always made our house smell like an old world italian restaurant and as good as the aroma was somehow the taste was even better set out a jar of giardiniera for spooning on top —kira vosk milwaukee wisconsin beef italian beef cook
